statements: SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_title, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_description FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_title, event_location, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT event_title, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York' AND event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_title, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT event_title, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%CA%' ORDER BY event_location ASC;
SELECT event_title, event_description, event_date FROM events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, organizer_name FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(registration_id) AS total_registrations FROM Events JOIN Registrations ON Events.event_id = Registrations.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_registrations > 5;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, organizer_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Registrations WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'John%' AND email LIKE '%@domain.com';

SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time, organizer_name FROM Events JOIN Registrations ON Events.event_id = Registrations.event_id WHERE registration_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;

SELECT event_name, COUNT(Registration_id) AS total_registrations FROM Events JOIN Registrations ON Events.event_id = Registrations.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_registrations > 10 ORDER BY total_registrations DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, email FROM organizers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT attendee_name, email, registration_date FROM attendees WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT A.attendee_name, A.email, E.event_name, E.event_date FROM attendees A JOIN events E ON A.event_id = E.event_id;
SELECT O.organizer_name, O.email, E.event_name, E.event_date FROM organizers O JOIN events E ON O.event_id = E.event_id ORDER BY E.event_date DESC;
SELECT A.attendee_name, A.email, E.event_name, E.event_date FROM attendees A JOIN events E ON A.event_id = E.event_id WHERE E.event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT O.organizer_name, O.email, E.event_name, E.event_date FROM organizers O JOIN events E ON O.event_id = E.event_id WHERE O.role = 'Lead Organizer';
SELECT A.attendee_name, A.email, E.event_name, E.event_date FROM attendees A JOIN events E ON A.event_id = E.event_id ORDER BY E.event_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name FROM events JOIN event_attendees ON events.event_id = event_attendees.event_id JOIN attendees ON event_attendees.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id;

SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name, feedback_text FROM events JOIN event_feedback ON events.event_id = event_feedback.event_id JOIN attendees ON event_feedback.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;

SELECT events.event_name, attendees.attendee_name FROM events INNER JOIN event_attendees ON events.event_id = event_attendees.event_id INNER JOIN attendees ON event_attendees.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id;
SELECT events.event_name, event_feedback.feedback_text FROM events LEFT JOIN event_feedback ON events.event_id = event_feedback.event_id WHERE event_feedback.feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Events ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM Speakers WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM Sponsors WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Attendees WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT speaker_name, speaker_bio FROM Speakers WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY speaker_name DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM Organizers WHERE organizer_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM Sponsors WHERE sponsor_type = 'Platinum' AND event_id = 3 ORDER BY sponsor_name;
